divs: Sighting Detailsin my back yard watching stars over the desert then suddenly to my right apprx 75 feet away a very! bright round object. it was like a flood light, but the light did not spread. it stayed just around it. hovered over the desert and then took off at fantastic speed and made mulitple stops were it used light or beam as if searching ground for something. Only noise I heard was air as it went by. I watched it till it went over hills behind my home. I was not afraid at all, in point of fact I was really calm about the whole thing. This is not my first siteing, and not my last.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There has been one other sighting in Rosamond
There were no other sightings in Rosamond on or around May 12th 2011
